OUTLINE : This randomize , open-label , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord nodal status ( nodal status prior neoadjuvant chemotherapy v positive node prior neoadjuvant chemotherapy v 1-3 positive node prior neoadjuvant chemotherapy v 4 positive node prior neoadjuvant chemotherapy ) , prior adjuvant chemotherapy regimen ( anthracyclines taxanes vs anthracyclines v anthracyclines taxanes ) , receptor status endocrine therapy ( negative v positive prior endocrine therapy v positive prior endocrine therapy ) , age ( 18 34 v 35 49 v 50 59 v 60 ) , participate center . Patients randomize 1 3 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive trastuzumab ( Herceptin® ) IV 1.5 hour day 1 .
